trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Rehoboth Beach
There were no other sightings in Rehoboth Beach on or around August 14th 2001
divs: Sighting DetailsWe were walking along a sidewalk in an east to west direction at about 11 PM.Rob happened to look straight overhead and called our attention to two small,fuzzy objects, close together. They were closer together than the stars inOrions sword and about as bright, but a little larger. The fuzziness could havebeen due to the somewhat humid conditions. Although moving east3E west at a very high speed and, what appeared to be a very high altitude, theywere criss-crossing each other in a figure 8 fashion. They moved from directlyoverhead to about 70 degrees above the horizon in about 3-4 seconds. At thatpoint, they disappeared behind a hazy cloud. My wife, always skeptical aboutUFOs is not so skeptical any more I am a computer professional in a local schooldistrict and Rob is a history teacher in a middle school. My wife was employedas a teachertechnician in an elementary Media Center at the time.
